name: Hon. Roberto C. Santos
title: Municipal Mayor
biography: Mayor Santos is a seasoned public servant with a strong commitment to community development and good governance. He has spearheaded numerous projects focused on infrastructure, education, and healthcare.

name: Hon. Maria Elena D. Cruz
title: Vice Mayor
biography: Vice Mayor Cruz is a passionate advocate for social justice and youth empowerment. Her legislative agenda focuses on programs that support women, children, and marginalized sectors.

name: Hon. Jose P. Reyes
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Reyes is a dedicated public servant with a focus on agricultural development and environmental protection. He actively promotes sustainable farming practices and ecological preservation.

name: Hon. Ana Marie L. Garcia
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Garcia is a strong proponent of education and cultural heritage. She works to improve school facilities and preserve local traditions through various community projects.

name: Hon. Carlos M. Mendoza
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Mendoza is committed to public safety and infrastructure development. He champions projects that enhance peace and order and improve public utilities.

name: Hon. Emily R. Tan
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Tan focuses on economic growth and livelihood programs. She works to attract investments and create opportunities for small businesses and local entrepreneurs.

name: Hon. David S. Lim
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Lim is dedicated to health and sanitation initiatives. He advocates for improved public health services and environmental cleanliness programs.
